intro: Scopellaria diversifolia, commonly known as the diverse-leaved scopellaria, is a flowering plant native to the coastal regions of southern Africa. Scopellaria diversifolia is well adapted to coastal conditions, with mechanisms to resist salt spray and strong winds.
